panels.description: This panel shows the number of successful (204) PATCH requests to /api/upload/resumable_upload/ as well as all non-204 PATCH requests to that route
panels.title: Rustus Patch requests (last 1 min)

panels.description: This panel shows number of tasks currently executing at worker.
panels.title: Number of Tasks Currently Executing at Worker

panels.description: This panel shows status of celery workers. 1 = online, 0 = offline.
panels.title: Celery Worker Status

panels.description: This panel shows average task runtime at worker by worker and task name.
panels.title: Average Task Runtime at Worker
Currently Running and Queued Jobs vs Mean Upload

panels.description: This panel shows task prefetch time at worker by worker and task name.
panels.title: Task Prefetch Time at Worker

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rabbitmq_node" WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: MQ
